title: Tran - omnibus ipsa placebas - Zappone Eulogy

content.description:
Omnibus ipsa placebas plus quam filia matri,
Et plus quam puero mater amata suo.
content.question: In the sentence, Omnibus ipsa placebas is translated

choices.label: you yourself were pleasing to everyone
she herself is pleasing for every reason
they themselves are pleased in every way
everyone was pleasing to that woman

content.answer: you yourself were pleasing to everyone

unit.text: 4: Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry and Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 1 and 2
